verses.verse: Then the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> 'I am <S%H1419>exceedingly<s%> <S%H7065>jealous<s%> for <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> yes, with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2534>wrath<s%> I am <S%H7065>jealous<s%> for her.'

<S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> 'I will <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H6726>Zion<s%> and will <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%> Then <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> will be <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H5892>City<s%> of <S%H571>Truth,<s%> and the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> [will be called] the <S%H6944>Holy<s%> <S%H2022>Mountain.<s%>'

<S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H2205>'Old<s%> <S%H2205>men<s%> and <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H2205>women<s%> will <S%H5750>again<s%> <S%H3427>sit<s%> in the <S%H7339>streets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> with his <S%H4938>staff<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> of <S%H7230>age.<s%> <S%H3117><s%>
'And the <S%H7339>streets<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> will be <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H3206>boys<s%> and <S%H3207>girls<s%> <S%H7832>playing<s%> in its <S%H7339>streets.<s%>'

<S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H3588>'If<s%> it is <S%H6381>too<s%> <S%H6381>difficult<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> in <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> will it <S%H1571>also<s%> be <S%H6381>too<s%> <S%H6381>difficult<s%> in My <S%H5869>sight<s%>?' <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>

<S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H2009>'Behold,<s%> I am going to <S%H3467>save<s%> My <S%H5971>people<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H4217>east<s%> and from the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3996>west<s%><S%H8121>;<s%>

and I will <S%H935>bring<s%> them [back,] and they will <S%H7931>live<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and they will be My <S%H5971>people<s%> and I will be their <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H571>truth<s%> and <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>'

<S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> 'Let your <S%H3027>hands<s%> be <S%H2388>strong,<s%> you who are <S%H8085>listening<s%> in <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> to <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> from the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> [those] <S%H834>who<s%> [spoke] in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that the <S%H3245>foundation<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> was <S%H3245>laid,<s%> to the end that the <S%H1964>temple<s%> might be <S%H1129>built.<s%>

'For <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> there was <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7939>wage<s%> for <S%H120>man<s%> or any <S%H7939>wage<s%> for <S%H929>animal;<s%> and for him who <S%H3318>went<s%> out or <S%H935>came<s%> in <S%H369>there<s%> was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> of his <S%H6862>enemies,<s%> and I <S%H7971>set<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H120>men<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> against <S%H7453>another.<s%>

'But <S%H6258>now<s%> I will not treat the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> as in the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%>' <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>

'For [there will be] <S%H7965>peace<s%> for the <S%H2233>seed:<s%> the <S%H1612>vine<s%> will <S%H5414>yield<s%> its <S%H6529>fruit,<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> will <S%H5414>yield<s%> its <S%H2981>produce,<s%> and the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> will <S%H5414>give<s%> their <S%H2919>dew;<s%> and I will cause the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H5157>inherit<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> [things.]

'And it will <S%H1961>come<s%> about that <S%H9201>just<s%> as you were a <S%H7045>curse<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> I will <S%H3467>save<s%> you that you may <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H1293>blessing.<s%> Do not <S%H3372>fear;<s%> let your <S%H3027>hands<s%> be <S%H2388>strong.<s%>'

"For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H9201>'Just<s%> as I <S%H2161>purposed<s%> to <S%H7489>do<s%> <S%H7489>harm<s%> to you when your fathers <S%H1>provoked<s%> Me to <S%H7107>wrath,<s%>' <S%H7107>says<s%> the <S%H559>Lord<s%> of <S%H3068>hosts,<s%> 'and I have not <S%H6635>relented,<s%>

<S%H3651>so<s%> I have <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H2161>purposed<s%> in <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> to <S%H3190>do<s%> <S%H3190>good<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%> Do not <S%H3372>fear!<s%>

<S%H428>'These<s%> are the <S%H1697>things<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you should <S%H6213>do:<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> the <S%H571>truth<s%> to <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H7453>another;<s%> <S%H8199>judge<s%> with <S%H571>truth<s%> and <S%H4941>judgment<s%> for <S%H7965>peace<s%> in your <S%H8179>gates.<s%>

'Also let <S%H376>none<s%> <S%H408><s%> of you <S%H2803>devise<s%> <S%H9567>evil<s%> in your <S%H3824>heart<s%> against <S%H7453>another,<s%> and do not <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H7621>perjury<s%><S%H8267>;<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> are <S%H834>what<s%> I <S%H8130>hate,<s%>' <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> "
Then the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> 'The <S%H6685>fast<s%> of the <S%H7243>fourth,<s%> the <S%H6685>fast<s%> of the <S%H2549>fifth,<s%> the <S%H6685>fast<s%> of the <S%H7637>seventh,<s%> and the <S%H6685>fast<s%> of the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> [months] will <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H8342>joy,<s%> <S%H8057>gladness,<s%> and <S%H2896>cheerful<s%> <S%H4150>feasts<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah;<s%> so <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H571>truth<s%> and <S%H7965>peace.<s%>'

<S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> '[It will] <S%H5750>yet<s%> [be] that <S%H5971>peoples<s%> will <S%H935>come,<s%> even the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

'And the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> will <S%H1980>go<s%> to <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Let us <S%H1980>go<s%> at <S%H1980>once<s%> to <S%H9134>entreat<s%> the <S%H9134>favor<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and to <S%H1245>seek<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts;<s%> I will <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H1980>go.<s%>"

'So <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>peoples<s%> and <S%H6099>mighty<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> will <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H1245>seek<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and to <S%H9134>entreat<s%> the <S%H9134>favor<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>'

<S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> 'In <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> from <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> will <S%H2388>grasp<s%> the <S%H3671>garment<s%> of a <S%H3064>Jew<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Let us <S%H1980>go<s%> with you, for we have <S%H8085>heard<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> is with you. "'"
